This Arizona men's button-down shirt is perfect for casual outings or office meetings. It's made from soft woven cotton with a spread collar, chest patch pocket, and short sleeves. Style yours with everything in your closet.

Neckline: Collar Neck
Pockets: 1 Chest Slip Pocket

Title: J. Ferrar Big Ultra Comfort Mens Regular Fit Long Sleeve Dress Shirt
Description:
J. Ferrar tailored this men's big button-down with your silhouette in mind. Cut for a regular-fit from a recycled stretch-cotton blend, this printed shirt has a classic point collar and long sleeves with contrasting wave-print cuffs. Pair this style with everything from denim to suit pants.
Features: Stretch Fabric
Closure Type: Button
Fit: Regular Fit
Neckline: Collar Neck
Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve
Sleeve Style: Cuffed Sleeve
Apparel Length: 36.5 Inches - Back
Fiber Content: 63% Cotton, 33% Recycled Polyester, 4% Spandex
Fabric Description: Woven
Collar: Point Collar

Title: St. John's Bay Linen Mens Classic Fit Long Sleeve Button-Down Shirt
Description:
Style into your day while keeping the heat away when wearing this breathable button-down from St. John's Bay. Cut for a classic-fit, it's made from a soft cotton-linen blend with a spread collar, chest pocket, long sleeves, and button cuffs. Wear it with jeans and sneakers or chino shorts and boat shoes.
Closure Type: Button
Fit: Classic Fit
Neckline: Collar Neck
Pockets: 1 Chest Slip Pocket
Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve
Sleeve Style: Cuffed Sleeve
Apparel Length: 31 Inches - Back
Fiber Content: 67% Cotton, 30% Linen, 3% Tencel Lyocell
Fabric Description: Woven, Plain Woven

Title: Haggar Mens Stretch Fabric Slim Fit Suit Pants
Description:
Life is never too busy to make responsible choices. The haggar® smart wash™ sorona slim fit suit is made with premium sorona fibers, designed to minimize waste and conserve natural resources. Caring for your suit has never been so easy with innovative, performance smart wash™ fabrics designed for home washing machines.  and the 4-way stretch wrinkle-free fabric will make you feel as great as you look.
Front Style: Flat Front
Features: Lined, Stretch Fabric
Closure Type: Hook & Eye, Zipper
Fit: Slim Fit
Pockets: 2 Front Slip Pockets, 2 Back Button Pockets
Rise: Mid Rise
Fiber Content: 100% Polyester
Lining: Lined
Leg Style: Slim Leg
